text: Bucheggberg is one of the 10 districts of the canton of Solothurn in Switzerland, found in the southwest of the canton. Bucheggberg contains the following municipalities: Coat of arms Municipality Population (Dec 2005) Area, km² Aetigkofen 184 2.03 Aetingen 289 2.85 Balm bei Messen 111 2.15 Bibern 227 2.99 Biezwil 315 4.18 Brügglen 194 1.70 Brunnenthal 203 0.91 Gossliwil 194 1.98 Hessigkofen 246 2.25 Küttigkofen 260 2.17 Kyburg-Buchegg 324 1.61 Lüsslingen 494 3.22 Lüterkofen-Ichertswil 715 4.40 Lüterswil- Gächliwil 343 3.09 Messen 1021 7.05 Mühledorf 347 3.32 Nennigkofen 493 4.60 Oberramsern 96 1.77 Schnottwil 991 7.19 Tscheppach 192 1.86 Unterramsern 198 1.54 Total 7437 62.86
title: Bucheggberg District
